snippet.title: Shin Sangoku Musou | 真・三國群英傳 [ GBC ] - Stage 4
snippet.description:
This is Stage 4 of the unlicensed GameBoy Color game / HK Original "Shin Sangoku Musou" (真・三國無双), also known as "True Three Kingdoms", "San Goku Shi: Act C" or "Tun Shi Tian Di: Chi Bi Zhi Zhan" (吞食天地: 赤壁之戰).

It's a sidescrolling Beat 'em Up made by the taiwanese based Sintax Technology Co., Ltd around 2002. It plays rather well but also gets repetitive quick.

Unfortunately the battery in my cartridge died so I cannot save the game and I don't know if I'll ever want to play the whole game in one sitting. So better don't wait for it ;)

Gameplay was recorded on real hardware (no emulation) using a Gamecube GameBoy player with component cables and a Hauppauge! HD PVR.
